works.description:
This is actually about feedburner, but I 

can't find any place to report it. http://feeds.feedburner.com/AtheistFeed
 
is using full copies of every article posted at Freethought Blogs. We have
 
already had Tumblr shut down another site where the same owner did the
same  
thing and we want this one closed down too. I'll give just one obvious  
example below. Though he does include links to the original, he uses the  
entire article on his site, which eliminates the need to follow the link. 

We are fine with excerpts, but not stealing the entire site.
